doc.title: Elements of Eternity
doc.plot: This film is a meditative work which focuses upon the spiritual and existential perceptions of fire and water. It ponders the emotional, yet absolute dependence of mankind on the elements of nature. Fire and water. The essentials of life. The forces perpetuating eternity. To be is dependent on fire and water - the fire to enable being, the water to sustain being. Sacred are the elements of eternity... the elements of our destiny.
